activate InstName.{LitOperationName({Arg.description: Calls an operation on a component instance.

activate/stateless InstName.{LitOperatio.description: Calls an operation on a component instance.

addmonths Months, Date, {ReferenceDate}.description: Adds the specified number of months to the date, storing the result of the calculation in $result.

apstart.description: Pass control of the application to the component manager.

askmess 'MessageText{~MessageTitle}', {R.description: Display a message and wait for the user's response.

askmess/nobeep 'MessageText{~MessageTitl.description: Display a message and wait for the user's response.

askmess/question 'MessageText{~MessageTi.description: Display a message and wait for the user's response.

askmess/info 'MessageText{~MessageTitle}.description: Display a message and wait for the user's response.

askmess/warning 'MessageText{~MessageTit.description: Display a message and wait for the user's response.

askmess/error 'MessageText{~MessageTitle.description: Display a message and wait for the user's response.

blockdata.description: Defines a constant block of text.

call {Library::}LitFunctionName {(Argume.description: Execute the specified function or global ProcScript.

putitem list, index, element.description: Add or replace an item in a list.

putitem/id list, id, element.description: Add or replace an item in a list.

putitem/id/case list, id, element.description: Add or replace an item in a list.
